title: Help: Can't ctrl+click summoner cooldowns and ability cooldowns
body:
Title. It doesnt work when i try to click them on the HUD but it works when i TAB and then click... I don't know how to fix this. When I ctrl+click from my HUD it wants to activate them instead of type them in chat. It's hard to explain so I'll give an example: when i alt+click my smite from HUD and then click any monster or champ it uses smite. I want it so that when i alt+click from HUD it types in chat for me, anyone know how to fix? Thanks in advance

EDIT: same thing why my health/mana bars

replies.body:
Double check that you're using the right hotkeys, and if it's still not working try doing a quick config reset to make sure the hotkeys themselves are still setup properly.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
It is alt+click, not control click.
And in the scoreboard, most things don't require "alt", it's just click.
